label: Title
hint: DublinCore title. May be any free text

label: Label
hint: RDF Schema label, i.e. a human-readable name that applications can use for displaying in user interfaces. May be any free text.

label: Description
hint: DublinCore description, i.e. a human-readable description of the resource. May be any free text.

label: Comment
hint: Free text comment on the subject.

label: Name
hint: FOAF name, i.e. a name for some thing as defined in FOAF vocabulary. May be any free text.

label: Contact point
hint: Contact point about the suject. May be a URL.

label: Distribution
hint: Points to the download page of the resource.

label: Access URL
hint: URL that gives access to a the distribution of the dataset. Must be a URL.

label: Publisher
hint: DublinCore publisher, i.e. a person, an organization, or a service that is the resource's publisher. May be any free text, but it is advised to use URLs.

label: Keyword
hint: Keyword as in DCAT vocabulary.

label: Keyword
hint: Open Data Portal (ODP) keyword, used to succinctly describe the dataset within ODP.

label: Subject
hint: Subject matter of the underlying resource.

label: Theme
hint: Underlyingtheme of the resource as in DCAT vocabulary.

label: License
hint: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource. Usually a URL pointing to the document.

label: Date issued
hint: YYYY-MM-DD

label: Date modified
hint: YYYY-MM-DD

label: Identifier
hint: Identifier of the underlying resource. For example: digital-agenda-scoreboard-key-indicators

label: Landing page
hint: The home page of the underlying resource.

label: Page
hint: FOAF page, i.e. a URL pointing to the web page or document about the resource.

label: Accrual periodicity
hint: Publication frequencey, as in DCAT vocabulary.

label: Language
hint: The language of the underlying resource.

label: Spatial
hint: Spatial coverage of the underlying resource. May be a URL.

label: Temporal
hint: Temporal coverage of the underlying resource. May be a URL.

label: Status
hint: The current status of the resource, referring to the maturity of the distribution.

label: Access rights
hint: Refers to the visibility / permissions on the dataset. May be a URL.

label: Name
hint: Formatted name, the name of the contact point.

label: E-mail
hint: The electronic mail address for communication.

label: URL
hint: Web page of the organisation (a URL).
